source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of a large wooden contraption, resembling a catapult, set up on an airfield. A model biplane is attached to the device, positioned for a potential launch. The scene is stationary, with airfield buildings and mountains visible in the distance under a partly cloudy sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The wooden contraption is more like a transportation system than a launch system. The biplane does not appear to be ready for launch; it is merely suspended from the wooden contraption, with a white bag hanging beneath it. Both the biplane and the bag move as the boom of the wooden contraption rotates counterclockwise. A black sphere slides down the track of one of the wooden contraptions and out of the frame.  The scene is not stationary, camera is static.
